extendedInfo.description: Buy Carpet Direct, Inc. is the solution to your carpet and rug troubles. With a huge selection of the best quality and most affordable carpets and rugs in the market, we guarantee you will not look any further. We offer both machine-made and hand-woven products that come in a variety of colorful and fabulous designs. Choose from classic rug designs all over the world: Oriental, Persian, Turkish, Pakistani, Spanish, English, French and many others. We have accent rugs, area rugs, runners, braided rugs, carpet tiles and even cleaning tools and accessories for maintaining your favorite floor decors. Our carpets and rugs are made from natural and synthetic fabrics, and combinations of both. We have just about everything you need when it comes to making your floors at home and in the office a lot cozier and more attractive.
